Are you sure you want to delete your account? Once you delete your account, you will have performed an irreversible action. All your data will be permanently deleted and this action cannot be undone.
Account deletion is permanent. All data associated with your account, including your book lists, reading history, and other information, will be irreversibly deleted.
You can delete your account by entering your information below:

How can I create an account?
Click the "Register" button on the home page and fill in the required information. After verifying your email address, your account will be created.
How can I delete my account?
Go to "Account Settings" via the "Menu" section and select "Delete Account". Once you confirm the action, your account will be permanently deleted.
I forgot my password, how can I reset it?
Click on the "Forgot My Password" link on the login page and enter your email address. You can complete your transaction by confirming the verification code sent to your email address.
How do I add a book?
To add a book, find the book and click on it. When you click the "ADD" button on the book\'s detail page, the book will be added to your library.
How can I change the language settings?
Go to the "Application Settings" tab in the "Menu" section and select the language you want from the language options. The changes will be applied immediately.
How do I enable dark mode?
Go to the "Theme" tab in the "Menu" section and enable the dark mode option. The app theme will change immediately.
BookTime is an app designed for book lovers to discover, read and share. Our goal is to make the world of books more accessible and enjoyable for everyone.
Contact us with any questions or feedback:
